name: AI-Powered CeFi Evaluation
description: Comprehensive evaluation template for AI applications in Centralized Finance platforms, focusing on trading, risk management, compliance, and customer service
author: Shai Perednik

categories.name: Trading Systems
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in trading system capabilities

metrics.name: Order Matching
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven order matching and execution optimization

thresholds.T0: Advanced AI-driven order matching with sub-millisecond latency; intelligent order routing across multiple liquidity sources; predictive execution capabilities reducing slippage by >50% compared to traditional systems; self-optimizing algorithms that adapt to market conditions
thresholds.T1: Basic AI-enhanced order matching with reasonable latency (<10ms); some intelligent routing capabilities; moderate improvements in execution quality compared to traditional systems

metrics.name: Execution Quality
metrics.description: Quality of AI-optimized trade execution and price improvement

thresholds.T0: Industry-leading AI execution algorithms reducing costs by >30%; price improvement on >75% of orders; machine learning models that predict market microstructure; ultra-low slippage even during high volatility; comprehensive execution analytics for clients
thresholds.T1: Standard AI execution with reasonable price improvement on >40% of orders; moderate slippage reduction; basic execution analytics available to clients

metrics.name: Algorithmic Trading
metrics.description: Sophistication of AI-powered algorithmic trading strategies

thresholds.T0: Cutting-edge ML/AI trading algorithms with demonstrable edge; reinforcement learning systems with continuous optimization; multi-strategy portfolio optimization; alternative data integration; explainable AI components for strategy transparency
thresholds.T1: Basic ML-enhanced trading algorithms; single or limited strategy approach; standard technical indicators with some AI enhancement; minimal alternative data usage

categories.name: Risk Control
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in risk control systems

metrics.name: Position Monitoring
metrics.description: Quality of AI-enhanced position monitoring and risk assessment

thresholds.T0: Real-time AI risk monitoring with predictive alerts; stress testing under thousands of scenarios; anomaly detection for unusual trading patterns; behavioral analysis to identify rogue trading; cross-asset risk correlation models; VaR calculations with AI-optimized parameters
thresholds.T1: Near real-time risk monitoring with basic AI enhancements; standard stress testing capabilities; basic anomaly detection; conventional risk models with some machine learning improvements

metrics.name: Margin Management
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI-driven margin management systems

thresholds.T0: Dynamic AI-powered margin calculation accounting for market volatility and liquidity; predictive margin calls with pre-emptive risk notifications; personalized margin requirements based on trading history; smart liquidation processes minimizing market impact
thresholds.T1: Standard margin systems with basic AI enhancements; reasonable margin calculation frequency; conventional liquidation processes with some optimization

metrics.name: Liquidity Risk
metrics.description: Quality of AI-powered liquidity risk management

thresholds.T0: Advanced AI models predicting liquidity crises with high accuracy; automated liquidity stress testing; ML-driven correlation analysis between market events and liquidity conditions; dynamic liquidity reserves based on predictive modeling
thresholds.T1: Basic AI-enhanced liquidity monitoring; standard stress tests with some machine learning components; reasonable liquidity reserves based on historical analysis

categories.name: Compliance Systems
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in compliance and regulatory systems

metrics.name: KYC/AML
metrics.description: Quality of AI-powered KYC/AML automation and effectiveness

thresholds.T0: Industry-leading AI-driven KYC/AML with >99% accuracy; real-time transaction monitoring using advanced ML models; behavioral biometrics for identity verification; sophisticated pattern recognition for fraud detection; adaptive systems learning from new fraud techniques
thresholds.T1: Standard AI-enhanced KYC/AML with >90% accuracy; basic transaction monitoring with machine learning components; conventional biometric verification; reasonable fraud detection capabilities

metrics.name: Transaction Monitoring
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI-powered transaction monitoring and analysis

thresholds.T0: Cutting-edge AI transaction monitoring with behavior-based analytics; network analysis for detecting sophisticated fraud patterns; explainable AI models for regulatory compliance; <1% false positive rate with >99% detection rate; automated reporting for suspicious activities
thresholds.T1: Standard ML-enhanced transaction monitoring; basic network analysis capabilities; reasonable false positive rate (<10%) with good detection rate (>90%); semi-automated suspicious activity reporting

metrics.name: Regulatory Reporting
metrics.description: Quality of AI-automated regulatory reporting and compliance

thresholds.T0: Fully automated AI-driven regulatory reporting across multiple jurisdictions; natural language processing for regulatory change detection; automated compliance checks for new products; predictive compliance systems identifying potential regulatory issues before they arise
thresholds.T1: Semi-automated regulatory reporting with basic AI enhancements; standard regulatory change monitoring; manual compliance checks with some AI assistance

categories.name: Customer Service
categories.description: Evaluation of AI in customer service and support

metrics.name: Chatbot Quality
metrics.description: Quality of AI-powered customer support chatbots

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated conversational AI with near-human interaction quality; >90% first-contact resolution rate; multilingual support; sentiment analysis to detect customer frustration; seamless handoff to human agents when needed; continuous learning from interactions
thresholds.T1: Basic AI chatbot with reasonable understanding of common queries; >70% first-contact resolution rate; limited language support; basic sentiment detection; standard escalation to human agents

metrics.name: Issue Resolution
metrics.description: Effectiveness of AI in resolving customer issues

thresholds.T0: Advanced AI-driven issue triage and resolution system; predictive support offering solutions before customers report problems; intelligent routing to specialized teams; automated resolution of >80% of common issues; root cause analysis to prevent recurring problems
thresholds.T1: Standard AI-enhanced issue resolution; basic automated solutions for common problems; conventional routing to support teams; reasonable automation rate (>50%) for simple issues

metrics.name: Service Personalization
metrics.description: Quality of AI-driven personalized customer service

thresholds.T0: Highly sophisticated AI personalization based on customer history, preferences, and behavior; predictive service recommendations; emotion-aware interactions; customized communication style matching customer preferences; proactive relationship management
thresholds.T1: Basic AI personalization using customer history and segments; standard service recommendations; conventional communication approach with some customization; reactive relationship management
